entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
